about_the_game:
Look electrifyingly good with the Mainframe Overload Starter Pack! Dash into the match with a new outfit for Juke, a tasty-looking weapon wrap, and some Rogue Bucks to spend in the store to elevate your look!

Content:
- Mainframe Juke Outfit
- Rainbow Sprinkles Primary Weapon Wrap
- 300 Rogue Bucks
detailed_description:
Look electrifyingly good with the Mainframe Overload Starter Pack! Dash into the match with a new outfit for Juke, a tasty-looking weapon wrap, and some Rogue Bucks to spend in the store to elevate your look!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core i5-2320
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 555
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 3.20 ghz 12
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: Look electrifyingly good with the Mainframe Overload Starter Pack! Dash into the match with a new outfit for Juke, a tasty-looking weapon wrap, and some Rogue Bucks to spend in the store to elevate your look!
supported_languages:
